title: wood spring suites rooms available only 42$ a day.
posting_body: we have available rooms at wood spring suites immediately starting at 42$ a day.
we have weekly and monthly pay plans and after 30 days you become tax exempt!
if you are looking to relocate or need a place to stay this a very nice clean and safe place to stay.
we are currently getting remodeled at the moment so we will have brand new rooms in the next few weeks.
